jigiṃsati：，jigīsati [jayati 的 desid．] 欲求，貪求．ppr．sg．nom．jigīsaṃ．
jigiṃsati：，jigīsati [jayati の desid．] 欲求す，貪求す．ppr．sg．nom．jigīsaṃ．
jigiṃsati：[har + sa．har becomes giṃ； it is doubled and the former gin becomes ji] desires．
JIGIṂSATI：（har+sa） har trở nên --giṃ ước ao [aor] --ṃsi [pp] --sita [prp] jigi ṃsamāna
jigiṃsati：ဇိဂိံသတိ ဇိဂီသတိ
